title: Club
data:

| :--------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------- |
| Skill                                          | [Maces & Flails](/Maces_%26_Flails "Maces & Flails") |

| Accuracy                                       | +3                                                   |
| [Base delay](/Weapon_speed "Weapon speed") (%) | 13 (130%)                                            |

| Ranged?                                        | No                                                   |

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| - | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A heavy piece of wood. While clubs are rather primitive weapons, bashing someone's skull in with one remains a very popular and effective means of dispute resolution.***“I have always been fond of the West African proverb: ‘Speak softly and carry a big stick; you will go far.’ If I had not carried the big stick, the organization would not have gotten behind me, and if I had yelled and blustered, as Pankhurst and the similar dishonest lunatics desired, I would not have had ten votes.”-Theodore Roosevelt, in a letter to Henry L. Sprague. January 26, 1900. |

> This weapon falls into the [Maces & Flails](/Maces_%26_Flails "Maces & Flails") category. It is a one handed weapon.

**Clubs** are extremely basic weapons, found in the early Dungeon.

## Strategy

*From the learndb: "Not a terrible weapon forged in the fires of hell -- just a terrible weapon."*

Clubs are strictly inferior to [whips](/Whip "Whip"), which are almost as commonplace. They are marginally more powerful than 0 skill [Unarmed Combat](/Unarmed_Combat "Unarmed Combat"), but whips, [daggers](/Dagger "Dagger"), and [short swords](/Short_sword "Short sword") are all stronger for a 0 skill character.

Very occasionally, an early [unique](/Unique "Unique") like [Jessica](/Jessica "Jessica") or [Ijyb](/Ijyb "Ijyb") might spawn with a highly-enchanted club, giving you a vaguely acceptable weapon early on, but you'll still want to look for something stronger, faster, and/or with a [brand](/Brand "Brand"). [Killer Klowns](/Killer_Klown "Killer Klown") all carry branded, highly-enchanted clubs, but by the time you've reached the [Realm of Zot](/Realm_of_Zot "Realm of Zot"), you'll have access to dozens of better weapons.

| Mundane                                              | Magical                                                 | ["Devastator"](/Devastator "Devastator")                               |
| ---------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [![Club.png](/images/5/50/Club.png)](/File:Club.png) | [![Club2.png](/images/b/b1/Club2.png)](/File:Club2.png) | [![Devastator.png](/images/d/da/Devastator.png)](/File:Devastator.png) |

## History

- Prior to [0.23](/0.23 "0.23"), [Killer Klowns](/Killer_Klown "Killer Klown") didn't spawn with highly enchanted, branded clubs.
- Prior to [0.16](/0.16 "0.16"), club-[stabbing](/Stabbing "Stabbing") a monster would confuse it for 1-3 turns.
- Prior to [0.14](/0.14 "0.14"), clubs also qualified as throwing weapons, and they were suitable for use with the [Sticks to Snakes](/Sticks_to_Snakes "Sticks to Snakes") spell.

| [Weapons](/Weapon "Weapon")                          |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
| ---------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [Axes](/Axes "Axes")                                 | [Battleaxe](/Battleaxe "Battleaxe") • [Broad axe](/Broad_axe "Broad axe") • [Executioner's axe](/Executioner%27s_axe "Executioner's axe") • [Hand axe](/Hand_axe "Hand axe") • [War axe](/War_axe "War axe")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| [Maces & Flails](/Maces_%26_Flails "Maces & Flails") | [Club]() • [Demon whip](/Demon_whip "Demon whip") • [Dire flail](/Dire_flail "Dire flail") • [Eveningstar](/Eveningstar "Eveningstar") • [Flail](/Flail "Flail") • [Giant club](/Giant_club "Giant club") • [Giant spiked club](/Giant_spiked_club "Giant spiked club") • [Great mace](/Great_mace "Great mace") • [Mace](/Mace "Mace") ([Hammer](/Hammer "Hammer")) • [Morningstar](/Morningstar "Morningstar") • [Sacred scourge](/Sacred_scourge "Sacred scourge") • [Whip](/Whip "Whip") |
| [Long Blades](/Long_Blades "Long Blades")            | [Demon blade](/Demon_blade "Demon blade") • [Double sword](/Double_sword "Double sword") • [Eudemon blade](/Eudemon_blade "Eudemon blade") • [Falchion](/Falchion "Falchion") • [Great sword](/Great_sword "Great sword") • [Long sword](/Long_sword "Long sword") • [Scimitar](/Scimitar "Scimitar") • [Triple sword](/Triple_sword "Triple sword")                                                                                                                                         |
| [Polearms](/Polearms "Polearms")                     | [Bardiche](/Bardiche "Bardiche") • [Demon trident](/Demon_trident "Demon trident") • [Glaive](/Glaive "Glaive") • [Halberd](/Halberd "Halberd") ([Scythe](/Scythe "Scythe")) • [Spear](/Spear "Spear") • [Trident](/Trident "Trident") • [Trishula](/Trishula "Trishula")                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
| [Ranged Weapons](/Ranged_Weapons "Ranged Weapons")   | [Arbalest](/Arbalest "Arbalest") • [Hand cannon](/Hand_cannon "Hand cannon") • [Longbow](/Longbow "Longbow") • [Orcbow](/Orcbow "Orcbow") • [Shortbow](/Shortbow "Shortbow") • [Sling](/Sling "Sling") • [Triple crossbow](/Triple_crossbow "Triple crossbow")                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| [Short Blades](/Short_Blades "Short Blades")         | [Dagger](/Dagger "Dagger") • [Quick blade](/Quick_blade "Quick blade") • [Rapier](/Rapier "Rapier") • [Short sword](/Short_sword "Short sword")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
| [Staves](/Staves "Staves")                           | [Lajatang](/Lajatang "Lajatang") • [Magical staff](/Magical_staff "Magical staff") • [Quarterstaff](/Quarterstaff "Quarterstaff")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| [Throwing](/Throwing "Throwing")                     | [Boomerang](/Boomerang "Boomerang") • [Dart](/Dart "Dart") • [Javelin](/Javelin "Javelin") • [Large rock](/Large_rock "Large rock") • [Stone](/Stone "Stone") • [Throwing net](/Throwing_net "Throwing net")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
html:
Club

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.31: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
Name Club
Skill Maces & Flails
Damage 5
Accuracy +3
Base delay (%) 13 (130%)
Min delay 6 at skill 14
Hands 1H
Size Medium
Ranged? No
A heavy piece of wood. While clubs are rather primitive weapons, bashing someone's skull in with one remains a very popular and effective means of dispute resolution.

“I have always been fond of the West African proverb: ‘Speak softly and carry a big stick; you will go far.’ If I had not carried the big stick, the organization would not have gotten behind me, and if I had yelled and blustered, as Pankhurst and the similar dishonest lunatics desired, I would not have had ten votes.”

-Theodore Roosevelt, in a letter to Henry L. Sprague. January 26, 1900.

This weapon falls into the Maces & Flails category. It is a one handed weapon.

Clubs are extremely basic weapons, found in the early Dungeon.

Strategy

From the learndb: "Not a terrible weapon forged in the fires of hell -- just a terrible weapon."

Clubs are strictly inferior to whips, which are almost as commonplace. They are marginally more powerful than 0 skill Unarmed Combat, but whips, daggers, and short swords are all stronger for a 0 skill character.

Very occasionally, an early unique like Jessica or Ijyb might spawn with a highly-enchanted club, giving you a vaguely acceptable weapon early on, but you'll still want to look for something stronger, faster, and/or with a brand. Killer Klowns all carry branded, highly-enchanted clubs, but by the time you've reached the Realm of Zot, you'll have access to dozens of better weapons.

Mundane Magical "Devastator"

History

  • Prior to 0.23, Killer Klowns didn't spawn with highly enchanted, branded clubs.
  • Prior to 0.16, club-stabbing a monster would confuse it for 1-3 turns.
  • Prior to 0.14, clubs also qualified as throwing weapons, and they were suitable for use with the Sticks to Snakes spell.
Weapons
Axes Battleaxe • Broad axe • Executioner's axe • Hand axe • War axe
Maces & Flails Club • Demon whip • Dire flail • Eveningstar • Flail • Giant club • Giant spiked club • Great mace • Mace (Hammer) • Morningstar • Sacred scourge • Whip
Long Blades Demon blade • Double sword • Eudemon blade • Falchion • Great sword • Long sword • Scimitar • Triple sword
Polearms Bardiche • Demon trident • Glaive • Halberd (Scythe) • Spear • Trident • Trishula
Ranged Weapons Arbalest • Hand cannon • Longbow • Orcbow • Shortbow • Sling • Triple crossbow
Short Blades Dagger • Quick blade • Rapier • Short sword
Staves Lajatang • Magical staff • Quarterstaff
Throwing Boomerang • Dart • Javelin • Large rock • Stone • Throwing net

'''Clubs''' are extremely basic weapons, found in the early Dungeon.

==Strategy==
''From the learndb: "Not a terrible weapon forged in the fires of hell -- just a terrible weapon."''

Clubs are strictly inferior to [[whip]]s, which are almost as commonplace. They are marginally more powerful than 0 skill [[Unarmed Combat]], but whips, [[dagger]]s, and [[short sword]]s are all stronger for a 0 skill character.

Very occasionally, an early [[unique]] like [[Jessica]] or [[Ijyb]] might spawn with a highly-enchanted club, giving you a vaguely acceptable weapon early on, but you'll still want to look for something stronger, faster, and/or with a [[brand]]. [[Killer Klown]]s all carry branded, highly-enchanted clubs, but by the time you've reached the [[Realm of Zot]], you'll have access to dozens of better weapons.

*Prior to [[0.16]], club-[[Stabbing|stabbing]] a monster would confuse it for 1-3 turns.
*Prior to [[0.14]], clubs also qualified as throwing weapons, and they were suitable for use with the [[Sticks to Snakes]] spell.
